entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
